turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I get a tall iced caramel macchiato with whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Route 40 in Columbia, Maryland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a tall iced caramel macchiato with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks on route 40, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That is all for me. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 6 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.
